text: [Music]
welcome to aws
what's new i'm jeff barr i've got three
cool launches to share with you today
so first up a second aws region in japan
we opened up our tokyo region just about
a decade ago and our customers put it to
use right away
in 2018 we opened up the osaka local
region as a disaster recovery option
for workloads running in tokyo in
today's big news
that osaka local region is now a
standard aws region it's open to all aws
customers
the new name the aws asia pacific osaka
region
now has three azs a full complement of
services
it supports the c5d c5 i3
i3en m5 m5d r5d
x1 and x1e instance types there's also
some other aws infrastructure in japan
this includes 17 cloud front edge
locations a cloud
front regional edge cache and three
direct connect locations
to learn more and to see what our
customers in japan are doing read my
blog post
next up a new feature for aws
certificate manager or acm
for short you probably know already but
certificates are used to establish the
identity of a website and to secure
network communication
acm makes it easy for you to create
manage and renew their certificates
forgetting to renew a certificate
creates a situation is both disruptive
and embarrassing and i don't want that
to happen to you
so today's news acm now gives you
metrics and events
that let you track the time until each
of your certificates expires
you can monitor the days to expiry
metric and cloudwatch
and you can set alarms as reminders acm
also gives you
events and event bridge when
certificates are within 45 days of
expiration
you could use this to build an automated
or a semi-automated renewal workflow
you can read the what's new to learn
more finally we've updated the away slam
the console with a focus on key tasks
writing code testing monitoring and
configuring
there's a new configuration tab that
gives you direct access to common
configuration options
with less scrolling this includes
triggers permissions
destinations tags and lots more
the new design is going to allow you to
build test and run your serverless apps
with greater efficiency than ever before
to learn more read what's new or better
yet just open the console
before we wrap up i want to remind you
that aws pie week is approaching fast
we're going to celebrate amazon s3's
15th birthday with an entire week of
talks
all hosted on the aws channel on twitch
visit the link below to register for pi
week
and that's all for today as always we
look forward to your feedback
please leave us a comment below if
you've got a question about anything
i've shared
send it my way i'll pick the best one
each week share it in a future video
to see some more videos just like this
subscribe to the channel
click that bell for notifications thanks
so much for watching we'll see you again
[Music]
soon
you
